channel.title: Comments on: WOW
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... for this kind of thing I would definitely need a pouch. By the way, did you see the demo itself (the video) from the Apple main website? It's a little long, but the phone is truly amazing.
item.content:encoded:
Hehe… for this kind of thing I would definitely need a pouch.
By the way, did you see the demo itself (the video) from the Apple main website? It’s a little long, but the phone is truly amazing.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: but you can already buy a pouch/case at amazon
item.content:encoded: but you can already buy a pouch/case at amazon

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: $500-$600 in June, but I think that only in the US....
item.content:encoded: $500-$600 in June, but I think that only in the US….
